survey_brief: This survey aims to identify key barriers and motivators influencing consumer adoption of electric vehicles (EVs) to inform marketing and policy strategies.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) in the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an electric vehicle (EV) in the next 5 years?

questions.question_text: What are the TOP 3 factors preventing you from purchasing an EV today? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is 'Somewhat likely', 'Neutral', 'Somewhat unlikely', or 'Very unlikely'
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-select with a max of 3 choices. Include 'Other' with open-text follow-up if selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with validation for max selections.

script.question_text: What are the TOP 3 factors preventing you from purchasing an EV today? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is 'Somewhat likely', 'Neutral', 'Somewhat unlikely', or 'Very unlikely'

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' above, please specify:
questions.routing_logic: Shown only if 'Other' is selected in Q2
questions.client_notes: Open-text field with character limit of 200.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text input with max-length validation.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' above, please specify:
script.routing_logic: Shown only if 'Other' is selected in Q2

questions.question_text: Which incentives would MOST effectively encourage you to buy an EV?
answer_options: Lower electricity rates for EV owners
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify priority incentives.

script.question_text: Which incentives would MOST effectively encourage you to buy an EV?
answer_options: Lower electricity rates for EV owners

questions.question_text: What additional concerns or comments do you have about EVs?
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text input with optional response.

script.question_text: What additional concerns or comments do you have about EVs?
